abstract: The U.S. commodity futures regulator is looking into claims by a trader in London that JPMorgan Chase was involved in manipulative silver trading, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing a person close to the situation.
snippet: The U.S. commodity futures regulator is looking into claims by a trader in London that JPMorgan Chase was involved in manipulative silver trading, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing a person close to the situation.
lead_paragraph: The American commodity futures regulator is looking into claims by a trader in London that JPMorgan Chase was involved in manipulative silver trading, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing a person close to the situation.

headline.main: JPMorgan Said to Face Scrutiny on Silver Trading

abstract: JP Morgan said Wednesday it would acquire a controlling stake in Gavea, a $6 billion hedge fund whose chief is Arminio Fraga, the former head of the central bank of Brazil.
snippet: JP Morgan said Wednesday it would acquire a controlling stake in Gavea, a $6 billion hedge fund whose chief is Arminio Fraga, the former head of the central bank of Brazil.
lead_paragraph: JP Morgan Chase said on Wednesday that it would acquire a controlling stake in Gávea Investimentos, a $6 billion hedge fund founded by Arminio Fraga, former head of the central bank of Brazil.

headline.main: JPMorgan’s Highbridge to Buy Gávea of Brazil
